name: Theofilos Kammenou
personality: quiet and reserved, but extremely focused and precise in his work
story: Gregor grew up on the island of Crete, where he spent most of his childhood hunting in the mountains with his father. He learned to shoot at a young age and quickly developed a natural talent for marksmanship. After completing his mandatory military service, he joined the Greek army's special forces unit and honed his skills as a sniper. Gregor was eventually recruited by NATO and now serves as a BLUFOR marksman in various operations around the world.
